law.text: The parties to a proceeding to obtain a declaratory judgment, order or decree, may stipulate with reference to the allowance of costs and in the absence of such stipulation the court may make such award of costs as may seem equitable and just.
law.history: Transferred 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1953, from C.C. sec. 639a-8. -- Created 1922 Ky. Acts ch. 83, sec. 8.
